## Quarto

```{r}
set.seed(123)
starbucks <- read.csv("data/starbucks_locations.csv")

lat <- as.numeric(readline(prompt = "Latitude: "))
long <- as.numeric(readline(prompt = "Longitude: "))

nearest_starbucks <- function(latitude, longitude) {
  distance <- sqrt((starbucks$Latitude - latitude)^2 + (starbucks$Longitude - longitude)^2)
  
  closest_index <- which.min(distance)
  
  return(starbucks$Store.Name[closest_index])
}

closest <- nearest_starbucks(lat, long)
cat("The nearest Starbucks is:", closest)
```
